phases.description: Establish core infrastructure, security frameworks, and compliance foundations
Implement transaction authorization, fraud detection, and currency support
Connect with payment networks, banking systems, and external data providers
Optimize performance, implement compliance monitoring, and comprehensive testing
Production deployment, monitoring setup, and operational procedures

tasks.title: Setup Kubernetes Microservices Infrastructure
tasks.description: Deploy containerized microservices architecture with Kubernetes orchestration and service mesh

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given Kubernetes cluster is available, when microservices are deployed, then each service is independently scalable
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: All services deployed with auto-scaling policies configured

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given service mesh is configured, when services communicate, then all inter-service traffic is secured and monitored

tasks.title: Implement HSM-Based Encryption Infrastructure
tasks.description: Deploy Hardware Security Modules and implement AES-256 encryption for data at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given HSM devices are configured, when encryption keys are generated, then FIPS 140-2 Level 3 compliance is verified
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: FIPS 140-2 certification documentation and test results

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given all data storage, when data is written, then AES-256 encryption is applied with HSM key management
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Encryption implementation validated with security audit

tasks.title: Design Multi-Factor Authentication System
tasks.description: Implement OAuth 2.0 with JWT tokens, smart card authentication, and biometric verification for system access control

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given user credentials, when authentication is requested, then multi-factor verification is enforced
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: MFA workflow tested with all supported factor types

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given session management, when user is idle for 15 minutes, then session is automatically terminated

risk_factors.mitigation: Multiple vendor support and fallback options

tasks.title: Setup Apache Kafka Event Streaming Platform
tasks.description: Deploy Kafka cluster with schema registry for event-driven processing with exactly-once delivery guarantees

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given Kafka cluster deployment, when events are published, then exactly-once delivery is guaranteed
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Event delivery semantics validated under failure conditions

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given event throughput requirement, when processing 100,000 events/second, then sustained performance is maintained

risk_factors.risk: Event ordering complexity in distributed environment
risk_factors.mitigation: Partition strategy and ordering key design

tasks.title: Implement Saga Pattern for Distributed Transactions
tasks.description: Design compensating transaction patterns for maintaining ACID compliance across distributed microservices

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given distributed transaction failure, when compensation is triggered, then all participating services rollback successfully
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Compensation workflows tested across all failure scenarios

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given transaction completion time requirement, when transactions execute, then 95% complete within 5 seconds

risk_factors.risk: Complex compensation logic for business transactions
risk_factors.mitigation: Thorough business rule analysis and testing

tasks.title: Build Real-Time Transaction Authorization Engine
tasks.description: Implement core authorization logic with 150ms response time for domestic and 300ms for international transactions

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given domestic transaction request, when authorization is processed, then response is provided within 150ms for 95% of requests
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Authorization timing verified under load testing

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given transaction authorization decision, when approved or declined, then appropriate authorization code or decline reason is provided
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Authorization responses validated for all decision scenarios

risk_factors.risk: Latency targets may be difficult to achieve under peak load

tasks.title: Develop Multi-Currency Transaction Support
tasks.description: Implement real-time currency conversion for 47 major currencies with exchange rate feeds and accuracy requirements

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given currency conversion request, when exchange rates are applied, then rates are within 0.01% of source feeds
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Exchange rate accuracy verified against multiple data sources

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given market hours, when rate updates occur, then new rates are applied every 30 seconds
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Rate update frequency monitored and validated

risk_factors.risk: Exchange rate feed reliability and latency
risk_factors.mitigation: Multiple feed sources and fallback mechanisms

tasks.title: Implement Machine Learning Fraud Detection
tasks.description: Build ML-based fraud detection with real-time risk scoring and 50ms response time requirement

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given transaction evaluation, when fraud scoring occurs, then risk assessment completes within 50 milliseconds
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Fraud scoring performance verified under concurrent load

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Given fraud detection accuracy, when model operates, then >99% detection rate with <0.1% false positives is maintained
acceptance_criteria.definition_of_done: Model accuracy validated with historical and test data

risk_factors.risk: ML model training data quality and bias
risk_factors.mitigation: Comprehensive data validation and bias detection

test_validation.validation_notes: Successfully generated 24 comprehensive tasks across 5 phases with clear dependencies, acceptance criteria, and effort estimates. Critical path identified for project planning.
